images.description: SDSS image of region near spiral galaxy PGC 10137, also known as NGC 1048A, and lenticular galaxy PGC 10140, also known as NGC 1048B; the pair comprise NGC 1048. Also shown is the southernmost portion of NGC 1042
SDSS image of spiral galaxy PGC 10137, also known as NGC 1048A, and lenticular galaxy PGC 10140, also known as NGC 1048B; the pair comprise NGC 1048
